
// First example

((a + b)a*)* + (a + b(1 + b)b)aa(1 + a)

// Second example
((a + ba)a*)* + (a + ba(1 + ba)ba)aa(1 + a)

// Conway
a*(aab + bb*a + bb)*

// One of my favourite examples
c* + c*a(c*a + b)*c* 

// Well-known example from Conway
(ab*a + ba*b)*(1 + ab* + ba*)

// The same with 3 letters (also in Antimorov)
(a(b + c)*a + b(a + c)*b + c(a + b)*c)*(1 + a(b + c)* + b(a + c)* + c(a + b)*) 

// An example from I don't remember where.
1 + (ba)*ba(1 + a(a + b)*) + (ab)*ab(1 + b(a + b)*)

// A Kleene's axiom from Conway (also in Antimirov)
(aaaaaa)*(1 + a + aa + aaa + aaaa + aaaaa)

// Difficult to simplify
(a(bb)*a + ab + ba + bb)*

// Difficult to simplify
((1 + ((a + b)*bbb* + (b + a*)a)(1 + (b* + b(a + a*ab(a*b)*)(a + b)*b)(a + b)a*))b(1 + (1 + b)a)(b* + a*))*

// The example from Han & Wood
(aa + b)a*c(ba*c)*(ba*d + d) + (aa + b)a*d

// Minimize this one
(1 + b + a + b*)(((b + a)a*)* + (a + b(1 + b)b)aa(1 + a))

// Minimize this one
((a + ba*b + c(ab)*c*) + (a*b*c*) + (abc + a + bc))*

// Minimize this one
a(a + b)* + 1 + aa* + c*

// Minimize this one
(a + ba*b* + c(ab)*c* + d(a + ba*b + c(ab)*c*)*d* + e((a + ba*b* + c(ab)*c*)d)*e*)*
;
